label: contract
description: Fuel received under a purchase order or contract with a term of one year or longer.  Contracts with a shorter term are considered spot purchases

label: new_contract
description: Fuel received under a purchase order or contract with duration of one year or longer, under which deliveries were first made during the reporting month

label: spot_purchase
description: Fuel obtained through a spot market purchase

label: tolling_agreement
description: Fuel received under a tolling agreement (bartering arrangement of fuel for generation)
